verses.text: \w These|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, each \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w*:
\w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*;
\w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w and|strong="H1144"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*;
\w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* \w and|strong="H1410"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*; \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w and|strong="H1410"\w* Asher.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w descendants|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w numbered|strong="H1961"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* already \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

Now \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*,

\w but|strong="H6105"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* \w rapidly|strong="H3966"\w*; \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w became|strong="H7235"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7235"\w*, \w so|strong="H3966"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* land \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w came|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* power \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

“\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*,” \w he|strong="H4480"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* become \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w powerful|strong="H6099"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w us|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H5927"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H3051"\w* \w deal|strong="H7235"\w* shrewdly \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*; \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w breaks|strong="H7122"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w join|strong="H3254"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H8130"\w*, \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H3051"\w*, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w leave|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* country.”

\w So|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Egyptians \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w taskmasters|strong="H8269"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Israelites \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6031"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w forced|strong="H4522"\w* \w labor|strong="H4522"\w*. \w As|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* result, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Pithom|strong="H6619"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Rameses|strong="H7486"\w* \w as|strong="H5892"\w* \w store|strong="H4543"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6031"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* flourished; \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w dread|strong="H6973"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.
\w They|strong="H3478"\w* \w worked|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* ruthlessly

\w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w made|strong="H5647"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4843"\w* \w with|strong="H5647"\w* \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* \w labor|strong="H5656"\w* \w in|strong="H5656"\w* \w brick|strong="H3843"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w mortar|strong="H2563"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w with|strong="H5647"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w work|strong="H5656"\w* \w in|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*. \w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w imposed|strong="H5647"\w* \w was|strong="H5656"\w* \w harsh|strong="H7186"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* said \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w Shiphrah|strong="H8236"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Puah|strong="H6326"\w*,

“\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w help|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w observe|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* birthstools. \w If|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*; \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, let \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w live|strong="H2425"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*, however, \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1696"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w boys|strong="H3206"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* let \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w boys|strong="H3206"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*?”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* answered \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H5680"\w* \w are|strong="H2007"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w women|strong="H5680"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H2007"\w* \w vigorous|strong="H2422"\w* \w and|strong="H6547"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w midwife|strong="H3205"\w* arrives.”

\w So|strong="H3966"\w* \w God|strong="H3190"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w became|strong="H3205"\w* even \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7235"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midwives|strong="H3205"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* God, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6680"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: “\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3209"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Hebrews \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* allow \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.”
